name: billie
notes:
cute and cozy these are the perfect pants for that little one in your life. keep their baby legs toasty warm with this simple to make pair. 

**sizes**
directions are for infant sizes (3, 6, 9) [12, 18, 24] mos
 
**finished measurements**
waist circumference (measured unstretched): (13, 13¼, 13½) [13¾, 14¼, 14½]" / (33, 33.5, 34.5) [35, 36, 37] cm
length (with cuffs and waistband unfolded): (16½, 17, 18) [19, 20½, 22]" / (42, 43, 45.5) [48.5, 52, 56] cm
shown in size 3 mos / 33 cm. recommended ease: 5" / 12.5 cm of negative ease at waist.
 
**yarn**
[berroco vintage baby][1] (50 grs): (2, 2, 3) [3, 3, 3] balls #10072 toast
 
**needles and notions**
16" / 40 cm circular needles, sizes 3 / 3.25 mm and 6 / 4 mm or size to obtain gauge
1 set each double-pointed needles, sizes 3 / 3.25 mm and 6 / 4 mm
stitch marker
waste yarn to hold stitches
 
**gauge**
22 sts and 30 rnds = 4" / 10 cm in st st on larger needle


  [1]: https://www.berroco.com/yarns/berroco-vintage-baby
